summary: Far Reach Keep, an ongoing personal work in progress.
descriptionHtml:
Far Reach Keep is a personal custom player home built to fit my personal play style. But I figured that other players may enjoy this home so I am posting it here :)

I basically wanted a player home that offered more than Hearthfire, but was not as extravagant as the majority of the good player homes on Nexus. This player home is pretty much empty and ready for the dragonborne to move in, you will not find shelves full of rare items or armor or pots of gold, its just a bare bones (but kinda cool in my opinion) keep. 


*Requires Hearthfires*

Law friendly.
Trophy Stands for every type of trophy in the game.
Loads of mannequins and weapon displays to show off loot.
A library for all the books you collect.
Crafting facilities.
Dedicated staff including a bard and trainers (WIP).
Location, West of Whiterun, you cant miss it.


Current things that need fixing:
Write the keeps history and weave it into existing lore.
Sort out the Dragonsworn relationships and factions to make them all potential followers.
Fix the dragon so that it actually helps the dragonsworn when in range of the keep.
Build the quest (outline already done) so that the keep is constantly under siege.


Planned updates:
Add a dungeon that will hold displays for dragon priest masks and claws, and other special artifacts.
Add one or two fast travel portals (as I normally play with fast travel disabled)
Add a quest that makes the keep available to the player rather than just a freebie download as it is now :)

Recommended Mods to go with Far Reach Keep (personal preference)
Frostfall - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163/?


All comments and suggestions welcome, but please keep in mind that I made this player home for personal use.
author: nobrot
